name: Edimmu
description: The Edimmu is a medium undead creature capable of sapping the life force from foes, with notable incorporeal movement and a ghastly presence.
memorable: Its ability to rejuvenate after destruction makes it a persistent threat.
goals: To drain life force from living creatures and weaken adversaries.
relations: Often associated with malicious spirits and can be encountered near bodies of water.
environment: Typically found in desolate, haunted places or near magical water sources.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage, high Dexterity for effective attacks, and regenerative capabilities.
weaknesses: Very low Strength limits its melee combat effectiveness.
attacks: Inflicts necrotic damage through its Draining Touch, potentially exhausting and stunning its targets.
most_powerful_ability: Rejuvenation allows it to rise again after being destroyed, regaining full hit points.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, making it effective in combat even without traditional sight.
skills: Possesses a passive Perception of 14, enhancing its awareness.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its undead nature.
Gains advantage on attacks against magical water-associated creatures.
Only permanent destruction requires consecrated burial of its remains.
Can stun targets that are hit by its attacks.
Effects of its touch can critically reduce a target's maximum hit points.
test_queries: mobility through objects with necrotic attacks
undead that can regenerate and evade
